subject: Books and Literature
Athletics and Sports
Book Trade and Publishing
organizations: New York Times Best Sellers List
lead_paragraph: An Olympic runner’s story of survival in World War II topped the list of the 10 best selling sports books in August 2014, according to The New York Times Best Sellers List.
